attributes.title: Down Dreamery Lane - Ep. 41
attributes.caption: The interns have chased off the Everguards, rescued the townspeople, and finally have two more Infinights returned.
attributes.description:
The interns have chased off the Everguards, rescued the townspeople, and finally have two more Infinights returned. But with Dr. Ahem's Dreamery equipment lacking, can they dive into the memories of Slique and Spectril and find out what happened on that fateful night so long ago?

attributes.title: Ziggu-Rat Race - Ep. 47
attributes.caption: The interns have made it to shore, tracking Paralyte toward the ziggurat on the island.  However, acid rain, fish people, nightmarish creatures, and an unsettling jungle stand between them and their goal.

attributes.title: Mine-Boggling - Ep. 50
attributes.caption: After their harrowing encounter with Grisleve, the interns return to Boulderay to seek out Dr. Ahem, who has a long-missing piece of information that will reshape what the interns thought they knew about Paralyte and the Infinights. Delving deep into the Boulderay mines, can the Interns unravel the mystery that began so long ago?
